headline: Air Products’ NASA Hydrogen Win And What It Means For The Stock
summary: Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE:APD) secured major liquid hydrogen supply contracts from NASA. The agreements include supplying the world's largest hydrogen sphere at Kennedy Space Center. The deals extend APD's long-running role in U.S. space programs and support current government and private space missions. For you as an investor, these contracts highlight what APD actually does: industrial gases, with hydrogen as a core part of its business. The NASA win links APD to highly visible...
